CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.10a, reationgestationperiod (3N)
E2B (R3): G.k.6a Gestation Period at Time of Exposure (number) Conformance: Optional, but required if G.k.6b is populated. Data Type: 3N OID: None Value Allowed: Numeric
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use the gestational age at the time of the earliest exposure. Gestation period at time of exposure should be expressed by providing both a number and designation of units of days, weeks, months, or trimester.
CustomField.label: Gestation Period at Time of Exposure
